attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!
attributes.review: Ok first of all, it took waaay too long to download. it then began asking a series of questions that ended in me realizing it was going to steal my identity OR kill me. why would they need to know my blood type or social security number??? then my phone stopped working, once i got it to turn on again i immediately tried to delete the app but at every try donald trumps face would pop up and scream at me “are you sure you’re gonna do that” COVERING THE DELETE BUTTON!!! i can now only use that app and a few others on my phone

attributes.title: What the hell?
attributes.review: First of all, this app took me forever to download like come on it’s not that big, this is not fortnite dude. But it’s getting worst when i started to use the app my iPhone 11 pro always get lag and the screen always get dark when I’m using it?! I tried to uninstall it but every time Idid the phone glitch and other apps will be deleted!!! I have to sent my phone to shop for this like wth?! I will never getting this app anymore and will recommend others to not having them. This app should get ban ASAP!!!

attributes.title: Makes me want to move to Canada
attributes.review: This app is a racist transphobic homophobic sexual assaulter. He condones rapists and says that if a woman gets pregnant from being raped she deserves a punishment. He doesn’t care about the life the child would’ve had or how the mom had to go through that. He and his Vice President support conversion therapy which is torture and should be banned by the 8th amendment. He hasn’t worked a day in his life and he is an entitled orange. He failed at the corona virus and people are dying because he is incompetent. Anyone who supports him is blinded by privilege and is a white supremacist.

attributes.title: It’s took over a month to download it is robot app
attributes.review: I don’t recommend this app because it asks for your phone number and a valid password and I don’t want to give my information to an app and it took a long time to download and it is a bad app I would not recommend it at all like I said in the beginning I hope nobody download it ok. This app is Donald Trump and I don’t want him to delete TickTock and that’s also a reason that I am like this up but the main reason is the top I would not like Tik Tok to be band. Tick-tock change my life.💔💔💔💔😭😭😭

attributes.title: This app is  just unacceptable
attributes.review:
Not only I have been waiting for it to download for several hours but I cannot find enough word to describe how bad the app itself is. Very unsatisfied.I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS APP TO ANYONE. Not to mention how many bad reviews it has. I read that someone said ,, if it was possible to give zero stars to this app I would “ and I as other people agree with them. 
At first I had no idea that Trump itself could have an app like this. I was very disappointed to find out that I was wrong.
I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS APP even to my worst enemy.

attributes.title: Literally the worst app i’ve EVER DOWNLOADED
attributes.review: I have no idea why i downloaded this. I opened the app and my phone literally started glitching and making heinous noises. I tried clicking the home button but it kept saying €rrOr✨👁. so i shut my phone off but then smoke started to come out of my motherboard. I tried to delete the app but it wouldn’t let me. I then bought a new phone and it was downloaded on that one too and my new phone over heated and combusted and is currently on fire.  I’m trapped forever with this disgusting piece of garbage. THANKS A LOT 🗿

I got this app because I as a Trump supporter am a proud white supremacist and fascist, but even this was too much for me. the app took way too long to download and asked for my number immediately. I wish I could give zeros stars. Even this app was too racist for me. Also merch is gross and it gave me a terrible virus that sent every woman, bipoc, LGBTQ+, and disabled person in my contacts a very detailed message about how I don’t support them as people because they were dumb enough to not be born a white man. I don’t disagree but things should stay private.

attributes.title: PROB ONE OF THE WORST APPS I HAVE EVER GOTTEN😡😡🤬😤
attributes.review: Where do i even start...this took 34 weeks to download and as soon as i opened the app it asked me inappropriate questions. It also was SUPER glitchy and at some times would even turn my screen orange. It also took off all my phones memories and pictures and data and it would delete some of my apps on my phone. It would also show me homophobic,transphobic,racists, and just down right RUDE quotes from time to time. Im so sick of apps like this so please, GET RID OF HER SIS cuz idk who invited her but it was definitely not me.

attributes.title: THIS APP RUINED MY LIFE
attributes.review: So I downloaded this app to see what it was all about💞 And I am not happy🙄. It hacked all my social media platforms and I had to delete everything and buy a new phone😡 I do not have a lot of money so this was a horrible thing👊🏻. I also needed to get new credit card info and everything😰. They called me up trying to scare me✨ I have never felt so unsettled😭 My left toe nail fell off because of this horrid app😖Please remove this app to save my toe nail and many others😔 no one should have to go through this over an app😣😢😭

attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD 😤😤
attributes.review: Honestly the worst app out there, it look way to long to download and when it finally did I kept lagging and didn’t let me open the app and I even had to restart my phone 😒😔 when if did work my phone started lagging so bad I didn’t let me leave the app and it didn’t let me sign in or anything, it’s terrible and it’s a waste of time, it took up all my storage and battery 🙄😤 as soon as I deleted it my phone was acting normal again, THANK GOD I hope this app gets deleted it really is a terrible useless app. 💅🏼😒
